pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Performance Stemmer, Tokenizer, and Spell Checker for R // A spell checker and morphological analyzer library designed for languages with rich morphology and complex word compounding or character encoding. The package can check and analyze individual words as well as search for incorrect words within a text, latex, html or xml document. Use the 'devtools' package to spell check R documentation with 'hunspell'.
